name: latitudinally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the position north or south of the equator measured from 0° to 90°: The James River bisects the state of Virginia latitudinally. Illumination varies seasonally and latitudinally, and this variation can be large.
More examplesFewer examplesThese lavas extend for over 100 km latitudinally in this region, but the true extent of their outcrop remains to be established.We recorded forest type every 50m along 21 transects oriented east to west between the ocean and the lagoon, latitudinally separated by 500m.As night length and illumination vary latitudinally, so will activity periods.
